item.title: Fire staff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:2, topic:336557”]u have to make them work urself, i doubt any sources have these actualy working

hmmm this would probably be a good idea, add an extra inv space, not visible or touchable
have it like space 500, in the inv space that isn’t visible, ahve it have like 2147m of the rune type of the staff, and its deleted when u unequipt the staff, and when u put on the staff it readds the runes depending on the staff and all that other stuff, that seems pretty legit to me ;)[/quote]Or just add a condition in your method that checks for a staff when you cast lol.

Read full topic
